New Records: Bradley Beal scored a team-high 25 points as a reserve for the first time in nine years
Key Match Events: Suns snapped a four-game losing streak with a 109-99 victory over the 76ers
Pre-Game Insights: Bradley Beal came off the bench for the first time in nine years
Post-Match Reflections: Beal makes it clear he believes he is an NBA starter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Beal's performance in an unfamiliar role
Others: The Suns' victory ended their four-game losing streak
